long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Avoid mistakenly making changes to production projects via the GCP console, by smacking a big banner across the top of projects with an ID matching a regular expression you provide.

e.g. On all project names matching the regex /^bw-prod/ print the word 'PRODUCTION' in the banner.
